title: Satellite companies watching where DoD goes with 5G
summary: Hughes VP Rick Lober says DoD could take advantage of low Earth orbit satellites to deliver 5G for mobile users

title: Communications established with payload on stabilized PSLV upper stage
summary: Indian startup Digantara said July 6 its space-weather monitoring payload ROBI is operational onboard a spent upper stage of India’s Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle.

title: Looking to the future, Virgin Galactic purchases 2 more motherships
summary: The company's goal is to fly 400 revenue flights a year.

title: Virgin Galactic selects Aurora Flight Sciences to build new motherships
summary: Virgin Galactic announced July 6 it signed an agreement with a Boeing subsidiary to build two new aircraft that will be used as launch platforms for its next-generation suborbital spaceplanes.

title: L3Harris makes strategic investment in Mynaric
summary: L3Harris is making a strategic investment in laser communications company Mynaric with plans to make increased use of that technology for space and other applications.
